doc:
Tom Ricketts https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Ricketts 0 Thomas B. Ricketts (January 15, 1853 – January 19, 1939) was a London-born American stage and film actor and director who was a pioneer in the film industry. He portrayed Ebenezer Scrooge in the first American film adaptation of A Christmas Carol (1908), and directed one of the first motion pictures ever made in Hollywood. After directing scores of silent films, including the first film to be released by Universal Pictures, Ricketts became a prominent character actor. Thomas_B._Ricketts ( January_15_,_1853 – January_19_,_1939 ) was a_London-born_American_stage_and_film_actor and director who was a_pioneer in the_film_industry . He portrayed Ebenezer_Scrooge in the_first_American_film_adaptation of A_Christmas_Carol_(_1908_) , and directed one of the_first_motion_pictures ever_made in Hollywood . After directing scores of silent_films , including the_first_film to_be_released by Universal_Pictures , Ricketts became a_prominent_character_actor .
